name: MoveToTrash
description:
MoveToTrash is a 2d one button game, which allows you to shoot bottles as bullets in to a trash. The gun in the game is controlled by mouse axis x and y . Move to trash is a nice game that improve your concentration. It is stress free game which can be played in our browser. Don't forget to comment your suggestions on the comment box. Hope every one enjoy this game!

Thank You by the CEO of otinstudio
